data.text: Stefan Mitev is a software engineer with solid foundation in computer science and engineering. Understanding and applying best-practices, abstractions and concepts are key to his success in building and maintaining highly effective software systems. Besides formal becholors education, Stefan is constantly upgrading his knowledge to follow-up with the latest and gratest technologies and practices in the vast and ever-changing IT landscape. This page is self-contained CV and show-case of the experience and skill-set that Stefan owns in his lifetime to date. If you are technical and want to peek behind the scenes, you can take a look at the source-code for this site [here](https://github.com/mitevs/mitevs.github.io/tree/dev).

data.title: Front-end Consultant
data.description: Using various web-based technologies to bring formal specification into first-class UI/UX appealing experience for the front-end. Supporting development activities in multiple teams and projects, using the Backbase products

data.title: Full-stack Developer
data.description: Front-end and back-end developer for various in-house projects. Building internal suite of products for managing own's time and self-improvement by measuring KPIs.

data.title: Full-stack Developer | Intern
data.description: Internship period as a front-end and back-end developer. Building online flights reservation system as part of the internship program.

data.title: Java EE and Soft Skills Training
data.description: Courses for Java EE, Databases, Soft skills and Project management. At the end of the training we had to build multi-module Java EE application for online shopping.

data.title: Android Developer | Intern
data.description: Building various android applications, one of which was intended for the local bus transportation service. I was part of the team that was doing revamp and enhancement to this application.
